column1: Cesano Boscone (Lombard: Cesan [tʃeˈzãː]) is a comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Milan in the Italian region Lombardy
column2: located about 6 kilometres (4 mi) southwest of Milan.

column1: Cesano Boscone borders the following municipalities: Milan
column3: Trezzano sul Naviglio. It is served by Cesano Boscone railway station.

column1: Church of St. John the Baptist
column2: traditionally founded by the Lombard queen Theodolinda in 613
